summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5744 for the improvement of The Alley between Blocks 1 and 2, Niesz Plat of West Seattle, being the alley between 41st Avenue Southwest and 42nd Avenue Southwest, from Admiral Way to West College Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75809, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
